name: lzbase62
description: Compress strings into base62 [0-9a-zA-Z] using an LZ-based algorithm for JavaScript
author: polygonplanet <polygon.planet.aqua@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.compile: browserify src/index.js -o dist/lzbase62.js -s lzbase62 -p [ bannerify --file src/banner.js ] --no-bundle-external --bare
scripts.test: eslint src && npm run build && mocha test/**/*.spec.js --timeout 10000 && karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.ci: npm run build && mocha test/**/*.spec.js --timeout 10000 && karma start karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.watch: watchify src/index.js -o dist/lzbase62.js -s lzbase62 -p [ bannerify --file src/banner.js ] --no-bundle-external --bare --poll=200 -v
